{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR840N |revision=v2 |series=N300 |asin= |fcc_date=02/18/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR841NXV9 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.85 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32CSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, J3 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4; |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=F4:F2:6D |oui_eth=F4:F2:6D }} {{TagLine|Wireless N300 Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/TL-WR840N.html Product page]
